article.title: ITT to Research Simulation for Chem-Bio Smoke and Obscurants
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ITT Corporation, Alexandria, Virginia, has been awarded a more than $9 million contract to provide for research and development efforts in the area of modeling, simulation, and analysis for chemical biological smoke and obscurants.Â U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
